short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X/Twitter Group Chat Automation DM tool, Send mass DM (direct message) to group chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A robust Twitter group chat message sender that can automatically send text messages without being banned.

Utilize the TW Group DM Bot to connect with potential customers by sending bulk messages.

# Key Features

- Automatically send X/TW group chat messages in batches.
- Automatically send batch customized messages with one click.
- Send via a list of specific group chat links and import from a CSV file.
- Personalized messages using hspin syntax templates.
- Message templates.
- Save sending history to local storage.
- Continue task progress from history.
- Funnel filter to avoid duplicate sending by filtering all successful history or specific history.
- Automatically save sending results to history, download success and failure lists.

Please refrain from using this tool for spamming, as it goes against Twitter's policies.

# Frequently Asked Questions

For any inquiries, please refer to the FAQ section at https://twgroupsender.extensionsfox.com/#faq. 
If you have further questions, feel free to reach out to us at help@extensionsfox.com.

# Data Privacy

All data is processed locally on your computer, without passing through our web servers, ensuring the privacy of your exports.
